title: The Secret Life of Trystan Scott: The Complete Collection Volumes 1-5
description: The Complete Collection of The Secret Life of Trystan Scott serials in one omnibus edition.Fame has a price and Trystan doesn't want to pay. Everything he worked so hard to hide is about to be revealed. Nothing he can do will stop it. Within a few short hours everyone will know about his father and the sordid details of his past. There are four words Trystan's father said that haunt him--four words that he ignored--never fall in love. But it's too late. This is the complete collection of the prequel series to BROKEN PROMISES (A Trystan Scott novel).
author: H.M. Ward
